Actions.Name: Unholy
Actions.Effects: Attack target is branded. This action can also be made as a close blast 1 melee attack.

Actions.Name: Fear
Actions.Mark: While marked, that foe gains +1 curse on attacks and saves unless adjacent to an ally. If they end their turn adjacent to an ally, they can clear this mark.

Actions.Name: Grasping Dead
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 takes 2 damage, then must save. On a failed save, spectral hands grab and immobilize them until the end of their next turn. That character or an adjacent ally can use an action to end this effect, freeing them.

Actions.Name: Raise Dead
Actions.Description: Target defeated ally in range 4 and remove incapacitated. They stop being defeated and return with 50% hp. They can act normally and take a turn starting next round.

Actions.Name: Soul Shred
Actions.Mark: While marked, that foe gains Aura 1. Allies of that foe that end their turn in the aura take 3 piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Radiance of the Black Sun
Actions.Description: This character becomes immobile but gains Aura 2 until the start of its next turn. While the aura is active, Relict other than this character in the area cannot be reduced past 1 hp. This Aura also deactivates if this character is stunned.
